author: Juliet Spies-Gans
title: The Offshore Game of Online Sports Betting
text: The Offshore Game of Online Sports Betting Should we just legalize online gambling so it can be regulated? The New York Times By James Glanz, Agustin Armendariz and Walt Bogdanich Posted: 10/26/2015 11:30 AM EDT Bloomberg via Getty Images Hard by the High Line, in a vintage industrial building with a Romanesque arch, lights flash on powerful computers in row after row of metal cabinets and cages. Power lines connect the equipment to diesel generators on the roof. Cables route data through the building to conduits beneath New York City streets.
